description: While DEVICESALT files are hidden on a NOOK, they will appear in the device's storage directory when connected to a PC. Although DEVICESALT files are visible this way, they remain restricted to maintain the security of the NOOK device.
NOTE: In cryptography, a "salt" refers to a random value added to data, such as a password, to make it more secure by making encrypted passwords harder to decrypt through brute-force methods.
